'''Siman Farrokhzad''' is an Akademiya sage,<ref name="Medical Records">Interactable: [[Bimarstan#Medical History of Giyath Khayyam|Medical History of Giyath Khayyam]]</ref> the daughter of Agha Farrokh, and the current leader of the [[Farrokhzadan]], a group of [[The Eremites]] affiliated with the [[Fatui]].<ref name="FarroJournal">Interactable: [[Farrokhzadan Journal]]</ref> She was also friends with [[Khayyam|Giyath Khayyam]], [[Irfan]], and the [[Aranara]] [[Aranakin]].<ref name="Aranakin">{{Ref/Quest|Aranakin's Old Friend}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/Quest|Aranaga's Memory}}</ref>

==Story==
Many years ago, Siman and her friends Khayyam and Irfan often played in the forest with their Aranara friends.<ref name="Aranakin" /> Siman had always intended on becoming a great sage and eventually reached her goal, becoming a sage in Amurta and working with the [[Bimarstan]].<ref name="Medical Records" />

After Khayyam's memory took a turn for the worse due to his old age, Siman took charge of his treatment.<ref name="Medical Records" /> Recently, the Farrokhzadan became involved with the [[Fatui]] after successfully taking up a commission to exterminate a traitor. Siman took up [[Il Dottore]]'s commission of capturing Aranara for his experiments, and forwarded the commission to [[Lunja]] and her men.<ref name="FarroJournal" /><ref>{{Ref/Quest|Starry Night Chapter}}</ref>
